instructions: Image titled Take a Screen Shot (Screen Capture) Step 7 1 Go to the screen you want to capture. Find the image, picture, message, website, etc., of which you want to take a picture. Image titled Hard Reset an iPhone Step 2 2 Press and hold the Home and Sleep/Wake buttons at the same time. The screen will flash to indicate the screenshot. Image titled Take a Screen Shot (Screen Capture) Step 9 3 Open the Photos app. Image titled Take a Screen Shot (Screen Capture) Step 10 4 Tap in the lower-right. Image titled Take a Screen Shot (Screen Capture) Step 11 5 Scroll down and tap the album. The image you just captured will be the last image at the bottom of the album. Advertisement

Image titled Take a Screen Shot (Screen Capture) Step 12 1 Go to the screen you want to capture. Find the image, picture, message, website, etc., of which you want to take a picture. Image titled Turn On an Android Phone Step 2 2 Press and hold the Power and Volume-Down buttons at the same time. On Samsung Galaxy devices, press Power+Home. The screen will flash to indicate the screenshot. Image titled Take a Screen Shot (Screen Capture) Step 14 3 Swipe down from the top of the screen to open the Notifications Bar. Image titled Take a Screen Shot (Screen Capture) Step 15 4 Tap to view the image. [1] The image will be saved to an album labeled "Screenshots" in your default photos app, such as Gallery, Google Photos, or Photos on your Samsung device. Advertisement
